message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to acquire a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $9500.
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but my budget is quite limited. I would like to propose an offer of $8500 for the product.

I understand that you have a limited budget, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target price. I can offer it to you for $9000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still feel that $8500 is a fair price for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
I understand that you're still interested in the product, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to get closer to my target price. I can offer it to you for $9200.
Thank you for considering my previous offers. I would like to propose a price of $8700 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $8900, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. This is my final compromise.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $8800 for the product. I hope this offer is within your acceptable range.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $8900, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm thinking we're getting close to a deal. I can offer it to you for $8950.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to propose a final price of $8850 for the product. I hope this offer is acceptable.
